original_text: And we will cut wood out of Lebanon, as much as thou shalt need: and we will bring it to thee in floats by sea to Joppa; and thou shalt carry it up to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 우리가 레바논에서 당신이 쓰실 만큼 벌목하여 떼를 엮어 바다에 띄워 욥바로 보내리니 당신은 재목들을 예루살렘으로 올리소서 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And we will cut wood out of Lebanon
as much as thou shalt need
and we will bring it to thee in floats
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 그것을 뗏목에 담아 당신에게 가져가겠습니다

sentences.original_text: and thou shalt carry it up to Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 그것을 예루살렘까지 운반해야 합니다
